thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 16 of 571
thread.title: Sherri W
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Sherri W

author: Sherri W
title: Sherri W
text:
The Property Manager was polite and professional and efficient. The Property and our Unit is clean and just the right size. I am very happy.
However, upon check-in I was expecting the $1 first month deal and was told because my husband had had a unit at another property, I was not eligible. I just wish I had been aware of this before move-in. I still do not understand why I was not eligible, it is not a deal we have gotten before.
AND, why would a company not want to extend great deals to loyal customers? I would love an explanation or better yet the deal!!!!
